#summary The page metadata and the social media integation

= The page metadata =

The following tables describe the metadata provided on HTML pages. 

== Forced by base/heavy.html.ep for all pages ==

|| *type* || *tag* || *explanation* ||
|| core || meta http-equiv content-type || ||
|| core || meta http-equiv content-language || content langauge also set on html and body so we really are on the safe side ||
|| core || link "shortcut icon" || standard old-school favicon.ico at the set's root ||
|| meta || meta generator || ||
|| meta || meta author || ||
|| meta || meta copyright || ||
|| meta || link copyright || ||    
|| meta || meta robots || based on the values of stash variables meta_index & meta_follow, before hook sets to default "all" but if with setup then "noindex,follow", controllers are allowed to modify the default behavior  ||
|| meta || link alternate || links to the page in another language ||    
|| facebook || meta og:site_name || ||
|| facebook || meta fb:admins || ||
|| facebook || link me || links to facebook fan page ||
|| misc || meta loaded || the language-specific time when the data was loaded ||
|| misc || meta rendered || the language-specific time when the HTML was rendered ||
|| misc || meta environment || indicates the production environment in use ||
|| misc || meta credits || gives credits to some vital technologies that the system is based on || 
       
== Default provided by base/heavy.html.ep but overloadable ==       

|| *block* || *type* || *tag* || *explanation* ||
|| canon || meta || link canonical || links to the same page in the same language but without setup ||
|| canon || meta || meta og:url || see previous line ||
|| image || meta || link image_src || links to the site's logo in png format ||
|| image || facebook || meta og:image || see previous line ||

== Page type specific metadata ==
 
|| *type* || *tag* || *front* || *new1* || *news1* || *lists* || *list1* || *browse* || *view* || *search* ||
|| meta || meta robots || default || default || default || default || default || if q parameter given but no photos found then none otherwise default || default || if init parameter given then none otherwise default ||
|| meta || block canon || default || default || default || default || default || in no id mode links to the same page without setup, in id mode page > 1 links to the same page without setup and by using first thumb's id, in id mode page = 1 links to to the same page no id mode and without setup || links to the same photo without setup on runmode all with id || default ||    
|| meta || link index || || || links to news index || || links to lists index || || links to thumbnail page || ||
|| meta || link start || || || || || || links to first thumbnail page || links to first photo || ||
|| meta || link prev || || || links to previous article || || || links to previous thumbnail page || link to the previous photo || ||
|| meta || link next || || || links to next article || || || links to next thumbnail page || link to the next photo || ||
|| meta || block image || default || default || default || default || default || use a random thumnail on page, but if in pair mode pri nat use flag || use the photo thumbnail || default ||
|| meta || meta description || || || || || generated from pri and subject || || || a fixed text || 
|| meta || meta og:description || || || || || generated from pri and subject || || || a fixed text ||
|| facebook || meta og:type || website || catz:list || article || catz:list || catz:list || default "catz:thumbnails", in runmode pair on org, umb, breeder: non_profit, on nat: country, on loc: city, on others "catz:" + pri || catz:photo || catz:search ||  
|| facebook || meta og:title || site name & slogan || a fixed title || the date and the news title || a fixed title || the page title || in runmode all a title "n cat show photos", in runmode pair a title constructed from the pri and subject, in runmode search a fixed text + the search || photo number always + photo text if exists || the page title ||  
|| facebook || meta og:locality || || || || || || in runmode pair on loc contains the location name || in runmode pair on loc contains the location name || ||  
|| facebook || meta og:country-name || || || || || || in runmode pair on loc contains the country name || in runmode pair on loc contains the country name || ||
  
Currently metadata not provided is
  * meta keywords
 
= Social media integration =

== Facebook share ==

|| *front* || *news* || *new1* || *lists* || *list1* || *browse* || *view* || *search* ||
|| share the front page || || share the article (not older than 90 days) || || || || share the photo || ||

Share uses
  * the deprecated share API
  * text hyperlink  
  * canonical url as url
  * the og:title as text
  
== Twitter tweet ==

|| *front* || *news* || *news1* || *lists* || *list1* || *browse* || *view* || *search* ||
|| tweet the front page || || tweet the article (for articles not older than 90 days) || || || || tweet the photo || ||

Twitter tweet button uses
  * text hyperlink
  * canonical url as url
  * the og:title as text
